#summary Installation procedure on Ubuntu 8.04

= Installation =

Following Quick Start at http://www.joomla.org/download.html .

  * Install http://www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp-linux.html

{{{
tar xvfz xampp-linux-1.7.3a.tar.gz -C /opt
}}}

  * Start xampp - (use mysqladmin shutdown first if mysql is already running)

{{{
/opt/lampp/lampp start
}}}

  * Check XAMPP using localhost url. Need to secure later using

{{{
/opt/lampp/lampp security
}}}

  * Made a web directory for Joomla, downloaded and extracted there.

{{{
root@frubuntu:/opt/lampp/htdocs# mkdir joomla15
root@frubuntu:/opt/lampp/htdocs# unzip -l Joomla_1.5.15-Stable-Full_Package.zip
}}}

  * Finish Joomla install http://localhost/joomla15 

{{{
created joomla15/configuration.php from default in textbox
moved installation folder to /tmp
}}}

  * Hitting Admin or default page gives lots of "Strict.." errors trying the following in etc/php.ini

{{{
error_reporting = E_ALL & ~E_NOTICE
}}}
